item.dc:creator: @Taharahora Taharahora
item.description:
@Taharahora wrote:

then why dont you guys stop being dick wades and help a little bit people wont be able to learn without a little help.

flaming this guy isn’t helping at all you fucker.

OT:

[code]
c.fishtimer = Misc.random(fishtime(c.fishies, c.fishreqt));

    if (c.fishing) {
        c.startAnimation(c.fishemote);
        //frame174(378, 3);
c.stopMovement();
    }

  

	if (c.attemptingfish)
       if(c.clickObjectType > 0 && c.goodDistance(c.objectX + c.objectXOffset, c.objectY + c.objectYOffset, c.getX(), c.getY(), c.objectDistance)) {
            c.attemptingfish = false;
            c.fishing = true;
        }
}[/code]

item.title: [PI] - New skills system. *fixed*
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“Virgin, post:4, topic:462523”][quote author=X-J-K-X link=topic=565701.msg4114818#msg4114818 date=1348938472]

Alright guys this is my current skills all in one file: HERE
If you can find out why they are all wrong, i’d appreciate it.
[hr]
As if right now I am set on creating a new skills system, but i’d need alot of help with it…
I want it so that I have COMPLETE control over my servers skills, like as in depth as how much exp you get for a maple log, or magic log, or regular log. Could ANYONE please help me with this?

EDIT: This is in ActionHandler class. (I gave an attempt yesterday before I went to bed.)

case 313: //fishing spot if (c.Misc.random(100) >= 50) && (c.getItems().playerHasItem(303, 1)) { c.getItems().addItem(317, 1);//shrimp c.getPA().addSkillXP(50, 10); c.startAnimation(c.fishemote); } else { c.sendMessage("You do not have a Small fishing net."); } break;
But these are the errors:

[code]src\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:1554: error: illegal start of expres
sion
if (c.Misc.random(100) >= 50) && (c.getI
tems().playerHasItem(303, 1)) {
^
src\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:1554: error: ‘;’ expected
if (c.Misc.random(100) >= 50) && (c.getI
tems().playerHasItem(303, 1)) {

                         ^

src\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:1558: error: ‘else’ without ‘if’
} else {
^
3 errors
You’re the best, look at that 0 errors.
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
If you guys can help me perfect this, it should be all I need. Thanks.

[code=java]

            case 313: //fishing spot
                    if (c.Misc.random(100) >= 50) {
                    if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(303, 1)) {
                    c.getItems().addItem(317, 1);//shrimp
                    c.getPA().addSkillXP(50, 10);
                    c.startAnimation(c.fishemote);
		} else {
                    c.sendMessage("You do not have a Small fishing net.");
                    }
				}
    break;[/code]

If you’re trying to redo the fishing skill on your server, you’re going to need to take a lot more things into consideration. It’d be a lot easier and more efficient if you create your own fishing class and handle all of it from there, instead of doing each individual case.

edit: The Misc.random thing you’ve added in will mess this up, delete it and add a proper timer.
[/quote]I doubt he even knows how to add in a proper timer…[/quote]^ I doubt you do lmao I’ve seen your 1k help threads.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Da_Vein wrote:

Then help me… I got to go though 28 more skills and fix them… I’m just starting with this one.
I do not understand the Fishing class at all,… Like, I don’t know how to explain it I just need help… Everyone of my skills are messed up… I LEARN BEST BY VISUALS! Just a statement, I have teamviewer…

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] - New skills system. *fixed*
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

The way you’re doing it is horrible, if you’re not going to create a class to handle the fishing, just create a few methods to make your life easier. [quote=“Da Vein, post:3, topic:462523”]I wouldn’t understand how, i’d need help getting started. But honestly until someone proves me otherwise this is easiest for me, sure it takes time & effort but it’s worth it to me.

EDIT: RE-READ POST IT’S BEEN UPDATED![/quote]

Would it not be better to take a basic base of fishing and then work on it from there and make it how you like? The reason it’s not constantly fishing is because it’s a case and there’s no loop to tell it to keep fishing. Every time you click the case, it will do what’s in there, so in your case, add xp, item and start emote, then it will stop.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] - New skills system. *fixed*
item.dc:creator: @Virgin Virgin
item.description:
@Virgin wrote:

[quote=“X-J-K-X, post:2, topic:462523”][quote author=Da Vein link=topic=565701.msg4114781#msg4114781 date=1348933851]
Alright guys this is my current skills all in one file: HERE
If you can find out why they are all wrong, i’d appreciate it.
[hr]
As if right now I am set on creating a new skills system, but i’d need alot of help with it…
I want it so that I have COMPLETE control over my servers skills, like as in depth as how much exp you get for a maple log, or magic log, or regular log. Could ANYONE please help me with this?

EDIT: This is in ActionHandler class. (I gave an attempt yesterday before I went to bed.)

case 313: //fishing spot if (c.Misc.random(100) >= 50) && (c.getItems().playerHasItem(303, 1)) { c.getItems().addItem(317, 1);//shrimp c.getPA().addSkillXP(50, 10); c.startAnimation(c.fishemote); } else { c.sendMessage("You do not have a Small fishing net."); } break;
But these are the errors:

[code]src\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:1554: error: illegal start of expres
sion
if (c.Misc.random(100) >= 50) && (c.getI
tems().playerHasItem(303, 1)) {
^
src\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:1554: error: ‘;’ expected
if (c.Misc.random(100) >= 50) && (c.getI
tems().playerHasItem(303, 1)) {

                         ^

src\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:1558: error: ‘else’ without ‘if’
} else {
^
3 errors
You’re the best, look at that 0 errors.
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
If you guys can help me perfect this, it should be all I need. Thanks.
[/quote]

[code=java]

            case 313: //fishing spot
                    if (c.Misc.random(100) >= 50) {
                    if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(303, 1)) {
                    c.getItems().addItem(317, 1);//shrimp
                    c.getPA().addSkillXP(50, 10);
                    c.startAnimation(c.fishemote);
		} else {
                    c.sendMessage("You do not have a Small fishing net.");
                    }
				}
    break;[/code]

If you’re trying to redo the fishing skill on your server, you’re going to need to take a lot more things into consideration. It’d be a lot easier and more efficient if you create your own fishing class and handle all of it from there, instead of doing each individual case.

edit: The Misc.random thing you’ve added in will mess this up, delete it and add a proper timer.[/quote]I doubt he even knows how to add in a proper timer…

item.title: [PI] - New skills system. *fixed*
item.dc:creator: @Da_Vein Da Vein
item.description:
@Da_Vein wrote:

Alright guys this is my current skills all in one file: HERE
If you can find out why they are all wrong, i’d appreciate it.
[hr]
As if right now I am set on creating a new skills system, but i’d need alot of help with it…
I want it so that I have COMPLETE control over my servers skills, like as in depth as how much exp you get for a maple log, or magic log, or regular log. Could ANYONE please help me with this?

EDIT: This is in ActionHandler class. (I gave an attempt yesterday before I went to bed.)

case 313: //fishing spot if (c.getItems().freeSlots() == 0) { //checks for free slots c. sendMessage("Your inventory is full."); c.fishing = false; } else if (Misc.random(2) == 1) { //If catch fish. c.getItems().playerHasItem(303, 1); c.fishing = true; //fishing is active. c.getItems().addItem(317, 1);//shrimp c.getPA().addSkillXP(50, 10); c.fishemote = 622; //the emote. } else { c.sendMessage("You do not have a Small fishing, or you failed to make a catch."); c.fishing = false; } break;
There are no errors with it but you would have to keep clicking on the fishing spot to possibly get more fish, how would I make it to where it is automatic all you have to do is click it once and it continues to repeat itself??

Read full topic
